column4: Is there any guides on net which tells me the difference between ext2, ext3, ntfs, fat16(32) or other filesystems? I have always been wondering what the differences are
> ext2/3 are the main linux FS, NTFS is the Win 200/XP FS and FAT is the DOS/Win 9x
Yes I knew that too, but a little bit more depth than that
> what exactly do you want to know ?
